floatBtn.title: Turn the page, but write it first
floatBtn.ecotext: Our commitment to environmental sustainability and eco-friendly practices helps create a better future for our planet.

about.parasmall: Each page here is a final act, a stylish farewell, a confession or a rebellion.
about.title: Boom. Bye. Period.
about.para: This is the hall of fame of exits. Spicy, touching, sometimes awkward pages... but always authentic. Guaranteed clicks, guaranteed drama. Come see how to slam the door in style. These pages tell stories of departure. Some peaceful, some abrupt, but all driven by a desire to leave a mark, a trace. Because behind every ending, there's a story.

banner.para1: When everything ends, thereâ€™s always something to say. Through TheEnd.page, users create stylish goodbye pages where emotions, memories, and last jabs come to life. Because sometimes, slamming the door is also making a statement.

solutionSection.title: Your end, your style, our solution
solutionSection.description: TheEnd.page is more than just a page generator. Itâ€™s an interactive platform that lets each user turn a breakup or exit into a creative and personal act.

models.title: Inspiring page templates
models.description: A library of predefined styles for those who want to leave in style, without starting from scratch.

link.title: A shareable link
link.description: Each goodbye page comes with a unique URL, easy to send to colleagues, exes, project partners, or friends. Endings are meant to be shared!

ai.title: AI Assistance
ai.description: AI helps you choose from predefined templates that match your vibe: 'Gentle Goodbye', 'Rage Quit', 'Stylish Exit', etc.

footer.quote: Because thereâ€™s always something to say... before leaving.

hori.title: Words of the end
hori.para: Behind every ending, there's a story. Here are those brave enough to write and share theirs. Honest, angry, funny, or moving â€” every goodbye matters.

exitPagesSection.title: Slam the door, but leave your mark
exitPagesSection.description: They left, but their page remained. Discover masterpieces of drama, sarcasm, poetry, or pure nonsense. Laughter, tears, and secondhand embarrassment guaranteed. Some exits are louder than others...

futureChronicles.title: The Future Chronicles
futureChronicles.description: An interstellar adventure in a world where time bends to human emotions.

lastSilence.title: The Last Silence
lastSilence.description: A psychological thriller about the power of secrets in a too-chatty world.

digitalRebirth.title: Digital Rebirth
digitalRebirth.description: When artificial intelligence discovers human poetry.

testimo.para: With TheEnd.page, these users turned their exits into unforgettable moments â€” sometimes funny, sometimes touching, sometimes explosive. Here are their stories, their pages, and their words. Because a great exit deserves to be told.

testimo-items.name: Camille R. â€” former HR collaborator
testimo-items.text: I wanted to avoid the awkward goodbye partyâ€¦ My page went viral in the office within 15 minutes. We still laugh about it in the WhatsApp group!

testimo-items.name: Lucas T. â€” burned-out freelancer
testimo-items.text: TheEnd.page helped me say goodbye to a toxic client with ironyâ€¦ and a playlist. It was freeing. And classy.

testimo-items.name: Sophie D. â€” former Discord member
testimo-items.text: I left a server that was getting out of hand. My goodbye page? 100% passive-aggressive, 100% me.

testimo-items.name: Jonathan B. â€” tired fullstack dev
testimo-items.text: AI gave me the best punchlines for my resignation. My page was shared 62 times. Iâ€™m a legend in the open space.

testimo-items.name: MÃ©lanie P. â€” peacefully single
testimo-items.text: I used TheEnd.page to close the chapter with my ex. I said everything I neededâ€¦ with poetry and humor. Even he liked it.

testimo-items.text: I used TheEnd.page to close the chapter with my ex. I said everything I neededâ€¦ with poetry and humor. Even he liked it.

contact.para: Want to send a final message or a random quote? Go for it. We love surprises.
